"Dantre":
"Hey, a new face!
...Yep, you definitely look like a new arrival."
"Come see me once you've honed your skills a little!"
"You came! I'm Dantre, the melee Class training instructor!"
"Hmm, you've been practicing, haven't you? I can tell just by the way you're holding yourself!"
"If you're looking to learn the art of battle, I've got plenty to share. Now, which Class do you want me to teach you about?"

"You sure...?
Well, come back and see me when you decide to get serious!"
"Keep practicing and gaining experience so you can become a full-fledged ARKS!"
"As you should have learned from your training, Class Skills are very important."
"But just learning them won't do you any good. The important thing is to actually use them!"
